ComicInfo.Title: Part 3: Dead Men Tell No Tales Bubba
ComicInfo.Summary:
Danny and company watch a video tape which sheds light on the Lord of Gore murders, and leads them to the set of the latest Lord of Whores porn parody film. The gang gets an education in the secret history of Lord of Gore, and meets porn star Johnny Jackhammer, a man who is suspiciously similar to a certain axe-wielding maniac. Yeah, it's the one you're thinking of.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Daniel Leister | 1 | B | Cover B | Matthew Southworth | 2 |
